Description: Average number of times a defined area is swept by mobile bottom-contacting gears (MBCG). Estimated as the sum of swept area for all vessels using MBCG divided by the total area of the defined area (e.g. of broad habitat type)
The number of grid cells (c-squares) fished at least once by MBCG (irrespective of the swept area within the cell), divided by the total number of grid cells (c-squares) within a defined area.

The sum of swept area across all grid cells (c-squares) in a defined area, where swept area in a specific grid cell cannot be greater than the area of that grid cell, divided by the summed area of all grid cells.

Indicator name: Smallest proportion of area in c-squares with 90% of total fishing intensity
Description: The smallest proportion of the grid cells (c-squares) where 90% of the total swept area occurs.
The inverse of I-2, evaluated over the entire assessment period.
The annual mean PD impact (Population Dynamics method, impact indicator) evaluated for a defined area.
The annual mean PD-sens impact (Population Dynamics method, impact indicator for sensitive species) evaluated for a defined area.

Indicator name: Proportion of area with PD impact < 0.2
Description: The proportion of a defined area, evaluated at the grid cell (c-square) scale, where PD <0.2.

Indicator name: Proportion of area with PD-sens impact < 0.2
Description: The proportion of a defined area, evaluated at the grid cell (c-square) scale, where PD-sens <0.2.
